channel.title: [pi] adding bonus to amour [pi]
channel.description:
hey guys, i am adding bonus to amour and i want it so you dont always max hit but i wont it so you can with the amour how would i tell how much bonus to add? the max hp is 130 so yeah or would i just haft to text it.
if theres a way please help

item.title: [pi] adding bonus to amour [pi]
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

alright i have a full rune on and the max hp is 130 i wont to be able to max hit with it not all the time but enough, does anyone know what bonuses i might add to it?

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] adding bonus to amour [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“EMINEM BEAST™, post:3, topic:393136”]Item.cfg, search for the item ID, replace the 0’s or whatever you have the bonuses set to, edit them to what you want them to be… Save it, then your done.
Example:

I think he was asking what to put as the bonuses for something, not quite sure.
